data.Name: Chad Gobert
data.staff_bio: Chad Gobert is an Online Training Specialist with the National Service Inclusion Project. Prior to working at U Mass Boston, he developed online training courses for users to access and receive certification nationwide in both the public and private sector.  Chad received his Master’s degree in Communication and Rhetorical Theory from the University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee in May 2007. In graduate school, his teaching focus included face-to-face classes in Public Speaking and online courses in Business and Professional Communication, emphasizing work force development and business acumen skills. Chad also received his Undergraduate degree from the University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee in Communication and Journalism in 2002. Chad’s volunteer activities include counseling for HIV outreach, testing and research for several years and participating in Big Brothers Big Sisters to encourage youth literacy and supportive environments.
data.staff_ed:

M.A., Communication and Rhetorical Theory, University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee
